Class InputHelper

Object
InputHelper
public class InputHelper extends Object
A utility class to help with common console input operations

  • Field Details

    • sc

      private static Scanner sc
      Shared scanner for all input operations. Date formatter for day-month-year format Indentation formatting for UI

    • DMY

      private static final DateTimeFormatter DMY

  • Constructor Details

    • InputHelper

      public InputHelper()

  • Method Details

    • init

      public static void init(Scanner shared)
      Shared Scanner for program
      Parameters:
      shared - scanner

    • readLine

      public static String readLine()
      Reads a full line of input and trims any leading or trailing whitespace.
      Returns:
      the trimmed line of user input

    • readInt

      public static int readInt()
      Attempts to read an integer from user input. If the input is invalid, the user is repeatedly prompted until a valid integer is entered.
      Returns:
      the integer entered by the user

    • passwordReader

      public static String passwordReader()
      Reads a password from console input. If the system supports secure password input, it will be used. Else, a normal line read is performed.
      Returns:
      the password as a String

    • readOptionalInt

      public static Integer readOptionalInt()
      Similar to readInt but returns null if input is blank.
      Returns:
      the parsed integer or null if blank/invalid

    • readOpenDate

      public static LocalDate readOpenDate()
      Repeatedly prompts the user to enter a date in DD-MM-YYYY format. Continues to retry until a valid date is provided.
      Returns:
      the parsed date

    • readCloseDate

      public static LocalDate readCloseDate()
      Repeatedly prompts the user to enter a closing date in DD-MM-YYYY format. Continues to retry until a valid date is provided.
      Returns:
      the parsed date

    • readOptionalOpenDate

      public static LocalDate readOptionalOpenDate()
      Reads an optional opening date. If the input is blank, null is returned. Otherwise, validates the date format.
      Returns:
      the parsed date or null if blank

    • readOptionalCloseDate

      public static LocalDate readOptionalCloseDate()
      Reads an optional closing date. If the input is blank, null is returned. Otherwise, validates the date.
      Returns:
      the parsed date or null if blank

    • pause

      public static void pause()
      Displays a prompt and waits for the user to press Enter.
